As one of the American South’s leading fashion publications, The KW Report is a collaborative approach to fashion: an attitude, a movement that inspires sociocultural and ecological transformation and informs those with whom it comes in contact. it collaborates within all aspects of international sartorial perspectives - from its team of fashion consultants, models, photographers and other artists, to educational resources and business partners.

-- Kerry Woodard
